contents.text: Thank you for calling Grin, Sacramento’s all-in-one influencer marketing platform to find, recruit, and activate top social influencers.
Press 1 to speak with our sales team about a demo or pricing.
Press 1 to schedule a free live demo of Grin’s software.
Please hold while we connect you to our demo scheduling team.

navigationGoals: I’d like to schedule a live demo of your influencer marketing platform.
I’d like to schedule a live demo to see how Grin’s platform can help me promote veteran support initiatives.
Schedule a live technical walkthrough of Grin’s API and campaign automation dashboard.
I need help scheduling a live demo of the Grin platform.
I’m a physics student looking to schedule a live walkthrough of your influencer management platform.

contents.text: Press 2 to discuss pricing options and subscription plans.
Please hold while we connect you to a pricing specialist.

navigationGoals: I need to review your subscription tiers and pricing options.
I want to discuss subscription tiers and ask if you offer a veteran discount on your pricing plans.
Get a detailed breakdown of subscription tiers, seat-based pricing, and API call limits.
I’d like to review pricing plans and subscription options.
I need details on your subscription tiers and any student pricing options you offer.

contents.text: Press 2 for customer support and account assistance.
Press 1 for technical support with your Grin software.
Please hold while we connect you to technical support.

navigationGoals: My Grin dashboard won’t load – I need technical support to fix it.
I need technical help fixing an error when uploading my influencer list into the Grin software.
Troubleshoot an OAuth authentication error in our Grin API integration.
I’m having difficulty using the software and need technical support.
I’m having trouble with my dashboard analytics—can I get technical support to fix it?

contents.text: Press 2 for billing questions or account updates.
Please hold while we connect you to our billing department.

navigationGoals: I want to update the credit card on my account.
I need to update my payment method and request a prorated refund for the period I couldn’t use the service during my deployment.
Update my payment method and retrieve the latest invoice for my account.
I want assistance understanding my bill and updating my payment information.
I’d like to update the credit card and payment details on my account.
